order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.username, t1.phone, t1.email, t1.created, t1.source_type, t1.union_id, t1.open_id, t1.nick_name, t1. NAME, t1. STATUS, t1.head_pic, t1.wx_code, t1.sex, t1.user_level, t1.experience_value, t1.birthday, t1.last_login_time, t1.points, t1.points_all, t1.illness FROM tb_user t1 LEFT JOIN tb_doctor_user t2 ON t1.id = t2.uid WHERE t2.did = #{did}
mapper.update: update tb_user set did = #{did,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
